mapper.select: SELECT trs_course_activity.id,trs_course_activity.trs_course_id,trs_course_activity.course_num,trs_course_activity.sort,trs_course_activity.apply_num FROM trs_course_activity as trs_course_activity LEFT JOIN trs_course as trs_course ON trs_course_activity.id = trs_course.id LEFT JOIN trs_activity as trs_activity ON trs_course_activity.id = trs_activity.id
